oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Jim Kagley interview
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ed Caudill
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Vietnam War, 1961-1975
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: James Robert Kagley served in the U.S. Army, in-country from February 1969 to February 1970, primarily as a heavy machinery operator. He was drafted at age 20. His hometown is Maryville, Tennessee, and he now resides in Blount County. He was honorably discharged. Audio interview: http://bit.ly/vv-jimkagley
